quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sam and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cleopatra, jaws. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where does Sam work in the movie I Am Sam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Starbucks

questions.question: In the movie I Am Sam, when is Sam and Lucys IHOP night?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: every Wednesday

questions.question: Who plays Sam Dawson in the movie I Am Sam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sean Penn

questions.question: What is Sam and Lucys last name in the movie I Am Sam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dawson

questions.question: How old is Lucy in the movie I Am Sam, when the Social Services try to take her away from Sam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 7

questions.question: What is Sam and Lucys favorite book in the movie I Am Sam?

options.text: Horton Hears a Who! Can You?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Green Eggs  Ham

questions.question: Who plays Lucy Dawson at the age of 3?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elle Fanning

questions.question: What disorder does Sams best friend Ifty have in the movie I am Sam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Attention Deficit Disorder

questions.question: What disorder does Sam Dawson have in the film I Am Sam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Autistic Disorder

questions.question: What legendary Hollywood actress portrayed Queen Cleopatra in the 1963 movie Cleopatra, one of the most expensive movies in history?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elizabeth Taylor

questions.question: Which of the characters from Steven Spielbergs 1975 movie Jaws was inspired by Captain Ahab from Herman Melvilles novel Moby-Dick?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Quint

questions.question: In the movie I Am Sam, when Sam and Lucy go to the school Halloween party, what is Sam dressed up as?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Beatle

questions.question: In the movie I Am Sam, this actress plays Rita Harrison, the pro bono attorney who decides to be Sams lawyer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michelle Pfeiffer

questions.question: Which Academy Award did the 2007 movie Pirates of the Caribbean: At Worlds End win?

options.text: Academy Award for Best Visual Effects

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of these

questions.question: The production of the 2007 movie Spider-Man 3 was one of the priciest in film history. What does Toby Maguires character study at the Columbia University?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Physics

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sweet Home Alabama and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, stars. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these Academy Awards did the 2005 movie King Kong win?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Best Visual Effects

questions.question: What actor portrayed James Bond in the 2008 spy movie Quantum of Solace, one of the priciest movies in history?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel Craig

questions.question: Ethan Embry, who portrayed Bobby Ray in Sweet Home Alabama, has been in several movies including Cant Hardly Wait and That Thing You Do! One of his earlier films, Dutch, also starred this TV sitcom star.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ed ONeill

questions.question: Why didnt actress Linda Hamilton reprise her role as Sarah Connor in the extremely costly third Terminator movie Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines in 2003?

options.text: Because her character dies in the middle of the movie
Because she had a fight with the director

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Because her character dies in the middle of the movie

questions.question: Melanie Lynskey, who played Lurlynn in Sweet Home Alabama, has starred in many films and TV shows. In which of these movies or TV shows did she NOT appear?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CSI

questions.question: What actor portrayed the popular superhero Superman in the superexpensive 2006 movie Superman Returns?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brandon Routh

questions.question: Josh Lucas, who plays Melanies husband Jake in Sweet Home Alabama, was part of the cast of Poseidon, in which Stacey Fergie Ferguson makes a cameo as a lounge singer. In 2004, Fergie started dating what other famous Josh?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Josh Duhamel

questions.question: Jean Smart stars in the movie Sweet Home Alabama as Jakes mother Stella. She has since starred again with Mary Lynn Rajskub in what popular television series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 24

questions.question: What character did actor Liam Neeson voice in the 2008 movie The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The lion Aslan

questions.question: Reese Witherspoon played Jill, one of Rachels two sisters on the hit show Friends. We all know Jennifer Aniston played Rachel, but here is the real question: What movie hottie did both Reese and Jennifer get a chance to work with?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mark Ruffalo

questions.question: Why did Kate Winslet decide she would never work with director James Cameron again during the filming of the 1997 movie Titanic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Patrick Dempsey plays Melanies fiance Andrew in the movie Sweet Home Alabama. We all know that he went on to star as Dr. Derek McDreamy Shepherd on the hit show Greys Anatomy, but did you know that one of his co-stars in Sweet Home Alabama also co-starred with him back in 1987s Cant Buy Me Love? What is the name of this co-star?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Courtney Gains

questions.question: Fred Ward, aka Melanies dad Earl in Sweet Home Alabama, has guest starred on Greys Anatomy with Patrick Dempsey. He played Denny Duquette Sr., father of everyones favorite Seattle Grace patient Denny Duquette. Did you know that he also played a father named Earl in another hit comedy back in the day? What comedy am I talking about?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Road Trip

questions.question: Mary Kay Place, who played Melanies mother Pearl in Sweet Home Alabama, has also starred on Greys Anatomy with Patrick Dempsey, who played Melanies fiance Andrew.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What exactly is the Felix Felicis in the 2009 movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, one of the most expensive films ever made?

options.text: A magic mirror that shows ones true self
A wise cat who knows the deepest secrets of the Universe

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Potion of luck
